kSoccerIntroduction: <0>kSoccer</0> is a football mod in the game SecondLife. You can customize and play with your own football palyer. Be part of a team and compete for trophies. Make your name among other players and become a superstar!
areYouAsecondlifePlayer: a SecondLife player? <1></1> <3>Get Started with kSoccer here</3>
areYouAksoccerPlayer: a kSoccer player? <1></1> <3>Go to the League</3>
orLoginIfAlreadyRegistered2: or <1>Log in</1> if you already have an account
